title: The Equation for Equality
summary: The Equation for Equality report is an original research effort backed by the Command Shift coalition, which Citi Foundation is a founding supporter, that unveils a previously overlooked, viable talent pipeline of women of color ready for careers in tech. Authored by Emsi Burning Glass, the report focuses on a brand new approach to sourcing, recruiting, upskilling and supporting women of color with many of the skills that overlap with tech job requirements.
